holiday_name: Easter Saturday – the day after Good Friday
Proclamation Day public holiday / Boxing Day

holiday_comment: only observed in certain areas of the state
areas of the state that don’t observe Royal Hobart Regatta
some regional areas in WA hold the King's Birthday public holiday on a different date
